Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:04.04]Fighting flames with fire
[00:06.44]Hang onto burning wires
[00:09.03]We don't care anymore
[00:14.02]Are we fading lovers?
[00:16.55]We keep wasting colors
[00:19.20]Maybe we should let this go
[00:22.36]
[00:23.71]We're falling apart, still we hold together
[00:28.77]We've passed the end, so we chase forever
[00:33.71]Cause this is all we know
[00:38.86]This feeling's all we know
[00:43.11]
[00:43.39]I'll ride my bike up to the road
[00:46.27]Down the streets right through the city
[00:48.89]I'll go everywhere you go
[00:51.38]From Chicago to the coast
[00:53.72]You tell me, "Hit this and let's go
[00:56.67]Blow the smoke right through the window"
[00:59.38]Cause this is all we know
[01:05.11]All we know, all we know
[01:07.69]All we know, all we know
[01:10.21]All we know, all we know
[01:15.30]All we know, all we know
[01:17.82]All we know, all we know
[01:19.78]This feeling's all we know
[01:23.83]
[01:35.95]Never face each other
[01:38.28]One bed, different covers
[01:40.84]We don't care anymore
[01:45.95]Two hearts still beating
[01:48.53]On with different rhythms
[01:51.01]Maybe we should let this go
[01:54.22]
[01:55.60]We're falling apart, still we hold together
[02:00.59]We've passed the end, so we chase forever
[02:05.52]Cause this is all we know
[02:10.77]This feeling's all we know
[02:14.87]
[02:15.19]I'll ride my bike up to the road
[02:18.17]Down the streets right through the city
[02:20.75]I'll go everywhere you go
[02:23.23]From Chicago to the coast
[02:25.55]You tell me, "Hit this and let's go
[02:28.31]Blow the smoke right through the window"
[02:31.31]Cause this is all we know
[02:37.00]All we know, all we know
[02:39.50]All we know, all we know
[02:42.00]All we know, all we know
[02:47.05]All we know, all we know
[02:49.57]All we know, all we know
[02:51.93]This feeling's all we know
[02:55.50]
[03:00.11]All we know, all we know
[03:05.17]All we know, all we know
[03:10.25]All we know, all we know
